mapper.select: SELECT IF(ur.resource_action != '', ur.resource_action, '/') resource_action FROM uc_resource ur, uc_role_res urr, uc_role r, uc_member_group mg, uc_group_role gr, uc_member m WHERE ur.id = urr.resource_id AND urr.role_id = r.id AND m.id = mg.member_id AND r.role_code = gr.role_code AND gr.group_code = mg.group_code AND m.acc_no = #{accNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select t.resource_id from uc_role_res t where t.role_code = #{roleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ttt1.ID, ttt1.NAME, ttt1.RESOURCE_ACTION, ttt1.RESOURCE_TYPE, ttt1.P_ID, ttt1.ICON, ttt1.NAME || if(rp.toolccolumn = null, null, '(') || rp.toolccolumn || if(rp.toolccolumn = null, null, ')') DESCRIPTION, ttt1.CREATE_TIME, ttt1.UPDATE_TIME, ttt1.ORDER_BY, ttt1.SYS_CODE, ttt1.STATUS, ttt1.RESOURCE_CODE from (select if(INSTR(RESOURCE_ACTION, 'reportFlag') = 0, null, substring(RESOURCE_ACTION, INSTR(RESOURCE_ACTION, 'reportFlag') + 11, tt2.tempIndex)) toolflag, tt2.* from (select if(INSTR(RESOURCE_ACTION, '|') = 0, LENGTH(RESOURCE_ACTION), INSTR(RESOURCE_ACTION, '|') - INSTR(RESOURCE_ACTION, 'reportFlag') - 11) tempIndex, tt.* from (select ID, NAME, RESOURCE_ACTION, RESOURCE_TYPE, P_ID, ICON, DESCRIPTION, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, ORDER_BY, SYS_CODE, STATUS, RESOURCE_CODE from UC_RESOURCE t where exists (select 1 from uc_member_group umg, uc_group_role ugr, uc_role_res urr where umg.group_code = ugr.group_code and ugr.role_code = urr.role_code and umg.member_id = #{memberId} and urr.resource_id = t.id)) tt) tt2) ttt1 left join rptpub rp on ttt1.toolflag = rp.toolflag

from UC_RESOURCE t where exists (select 1 from uc_member_group umg, uc_group_role ugr, uc_role_res urr where umg.group_code = ugr.group_code and ugr.role_code = urr.role_code and umg.member_id = #{memberId} and urr.resource_id=t.id)
